guiTeacher.components

Class TextField

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiTeacher.components.Component
      • guiTeacher.components.StyledComponent
        • guiTeacher.components.TextField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Clickable, Dragable, KeyedComponent, TextComponent, Visible, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchBox, TextBox

    public class TextField
extends StyledComponent
implements KeyedComponent, Clickable, java.lang.Runnable, Dragable, TextComponent
    A user-editable Text Component. Designed especially for forms, every TextField has a description that is draw above the field.
    Author:
    bnockles

                 int y,
                 int w,
                 int h,
                 java.lang.String text)
        Use for a text field with no description
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate within context of parent ComponentContainer
        y - y-coordinate within context of parent ComponentContainer
        w - pixel width
        h - pixel height
        text - - the initial value in the text field

      • TextField

                 int y,
                 int w,
                 int h,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 java.lang.String description)
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate within context of parent ComponentContainer
        y - y-coordinate within context of parent ComponentContainer
        w - pixels width
        h - pixel height
        text - - the initial value in the text field
        description - - the description drawn above the text field
